Select Image using.. Error processing image
Backup Restore You can sort the items by long pressing an item, dragging and dropping it the desired position.\r\nThe delete buttom (X) deletes all the current selected items.\r\nThe add button (+) allows to add a new item.\r\nThe last button you see allows you to sort all items in alphabetic order.\r\nOnce an app is selected, swipping it to the right you can delete the item To change the color click on the item you want to modify.\r\nYou can sort the items by long pressing an item, dragging and dropping it the desired position.\r\nThe delete buttom (X) deletes all the current selected items.\r\nThe add button (+) allows to add a new item.\r\nThe last button you see allows you to sort all items in alphabetic order.\r\nOnce an app is selected, swipping it to the left will allow you to copy the current color to the clipboard. Swipping it to the right allows you to delete the item. In order to delete a item from your selection, swipe it left in the list and the option to delete the item will appear.\r\nTo place an item in other position just long press it and drag it to the desired position.\r\nTo add an item press + button and a list with available options will be shown.\r\nIf you want to delete all your current selection just press the X button.
